verbs.description: [ARG0: Former U.S. President Teddy Roosevelt] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: said] , " [ARG1: Here is your country . Cherish these natural wonders . ... Do not let selfish men or greedy interests skin your country of its beauty , its riches or its romance] . " The current efforts by President Donald Trump 's administration to reduce the size of national monuments across the nation feels like a skinning of the first degree . The administration is reducing the size of cherished monuments such as Bears Ears , Grand Staircase - Escalante and potentially Oregon 's Cascade - Siskiyou , to open these lands to fossil fuel , uranium and timber interests . These areas were not selected for preservation for how much oil , gas , uranium or timber they contained . They were preserved for other merits that Americans value , such as biodiversity , scenic appeal , cultural and historical importance and wildlife habitat . Our members of Congress and the current administration need to unplug their ears and listen to their constituents , the majority of whom have said they want these special places preserved . Protecting our public lands ensures that future generations of Americans will be able to hike , fish , hunt and enjoy these natural wonders just as we have . I applaud Gov. Kate Brown and Sens . Ron Wyden and Jeff Merkley for standing up ...

Ron Wyden and Jeff Merkley for standing up ...

The administration is reducing the size of cherished monuments such as Bears Ears , Grand Staircase - Escalante and potentially Oregon 's Cascade - Siskiyou , to open these lands to fossil fuel , uranium and timber interests . These areas were not selected for preservation for how much oil , gas , uranium or timber they contained . They were preserved for other merits that Americans value , such as biodiversity , scenic appeal , cultural and historical importance and wildlife habitat . Our members of Congress and the current administration need to unplug their ears and listen to their constituents , the majority of whom have said they want these special places preserved . Protecting our public lands ensures that [ARG0: future generations of Americans] will be able to [V: hike] , fish , hunt and enjoy [ARG1: these natural wonders] [ARGM-ADV: just as we have] . I applaud Gov. Kate Brown and Sens . Ron Wyden and Jeff Merkley for standing up ...
